decisions.name: Does_Current_User_Have_an_Employee_Commissions_Record_For_This_Job
decisions.label: Does Current User Have an Employee Commissions Record For This Job?

decisions.name: Is_in_Legal_Collections_or_Bad_Debt
decisions.label: Is in Legal Collections or Bad Debt?

decisions.name: Is_there_a_Job_Commission_Record
decisions.label: Is there a Job Commission Record?

Flow.description: also known as the "WOW Widget", this flow is always on and when a user opens a job, if they are on a related Employee Commission record, they will see the "wow" details of their Job Commission. If the Job is Legal, Collections, Bad Debt, or House, a different message will display.

formulas.description: calculates the amount earned if the Deposit/1st Payment was met now based on current parameters - Job Amount, Split Multiplier, Margin Tier, Individual Percentage
formulas.name: forC_CurrentValueDep1stPay

formulas.description: calculates the amount earned if the Quick Collection was met now based on current parameters - Job Amount, Split Multiplier, Margin Tier, Individual Percentage
formulas.name: forC_CurrentValueQuickCollection

formulas.description: Calculates the amount earned if the Deposit/1st Payment was met now based on current parameters - Job Amount, Split Multiplier, Margin Tier, Individual Percentage
formulas.name: forC_CurrentValueSlowCollection
forT_LCBDissue
formulas.expression: If( AND( TEXT({!Get_Job_Commission_Record.Job_In_Legal__c}) = "Yes", TEXT({!Get_Job_Commission_Record.Job_In_Collections__c}) = "Yes" ), "as being in Legal and Collections", IF( TEXT({!Get_Job_Commission_Record.Job_In_Legal__c}) = "Yes", "as being in Legal", IF( TEXT({!Get_Job_Commission_Record.Job_In_Collections__c}) = "Yes", "as being in Collections", "" ) ) ) & IF( AND( TEXT({!Get_Job_Commission_Record.Has_Bad_Debt__c})="Yes", OR( TEXT({!Get_Job_Commission_Record.Job_In_Legal__c}) = "Yes", TEXT({!Get_Job_Commission_Record.Job_In_Collections__c}) = "Yes" ) ), " and having Bad Debt", IF( TEXT({!Get_Job_Commission_Record.Has_Bad_Debt__c})="Yes", "as having Bad Debt", "" ) )

Flow.interviewLabel: Job - Screen Flow - Job Commission Widget for BDs {!$Flow.CurrentDateTime}
Flow.label: Job - Screen Flow - Job Commission Widget for BDs

recordLookups.name: Get_Employee_Commission_Records_For_Current_User
recordLookups.label: Get Employee Commission Records For Current User

value.stringValue: NOTE: This Job was created before 2024 and therefore is not part of the new commission plan.
You are not a commissionable employee on this Job. See Job Commission record for more detail.

fields.name: SplitBanner
fields.fieldText:
SPLIT COMMISSIONS


Your split percentage share of the commissions is

{!Get_Employee_Commission_Records_For_Current_User.Individual_Split_Percentage__c}%

Here's the breakdown:

fields.name: QPJobStartDateIsNull
fields.fieldText:
DEPOSIT/1ST PAYMENT


This job must be populated with a Start Date for the Deposit/First Payment Incentive to begin tracking.

fields.name: QPInProgress
fields.fieldText:
DEPOSIT/1ST PAYMENT

{!Get_Job_Commission_Record.Deposit_FirstPayment_Incent_Days_Remain__c}

Days Remaining


Job Start Date:

{!Get_Job_Commission_Record.Job_Start_Date__c}

Deposit/First Payment Incentive Days:

{!Get_Job_Commission_Record.Deposit1st_Payment_Incentive_Threshold__c}

Deposit/First Payment Due Date:

{!Get_Job_Commission_Record.DepositFirst_Payment_Incentive_Due_Date__c}

fields.name: QPQualified2
fields.fieldText:
DEPOSIT/1ST PAYMENT


Great Job, {!Get_Employee_Commission_Records_For_Current_User.Employee__r.FirstName}! You earned the Deposit/First Payment Incentive which adds

{!forC_ActualDeposit1stPayAmount}

to your commissions for this Job.


Deposit/First Payment Due Date:

{!Get_Job_Commission_Record.DepositFirst_Payment_Incentive_Due_Date__c}

Deposit/First Payment Received Date:

{!Get_Job_Commission_Record.Job_Date_of_DepositFirst_Payment__c}

Tier Basis Points:

{!Get_Job_Commission_Record.Actual_Deposit_1st_Payment_Incentive__c}%

Deposit/First Payment Amount:

{!forC_DepositFirstPaymentAmount}

fields.name: QPDisqualified2
fields.fieldText:
DEPOSIT/1ST PAYMENT


The Deposit/First Payment Incentive was not earned. It was valued at {!Get_Job_Commission_Record.Deposit_First_Payment_Incentive__c}% / {!forC_CurrentValueDep1stPay}


Job Start Date:

{!Get_Job_Commission_Record.Job_Start_Date__c}

Deposit/First Payment Due Date:

{!Get_Job_Commission_Record.DepositFirst_Payment_Incentive_Due_Date__c}

﻿Deposit/First Payment Received Date:

n/a

Days to Deposit/First Payment Received Date:

n/a

Days over threshold:

n/a

fields.name: QPDisqualified3
fields.fieldText:
DEPOSIT/1ST PAYMENT


The Deposit/First Payment Incentive was not earned. It was valued at {!Get_Job_Commission_Record.Deposit_First_Payment_Incentive__c}% / {!forC_CurrentValueDep1stPay}


Job Start Date:

{!Get_Job_Commission_Record.Job_Start_Date__c}

Deposit/First Payment Due Date:

{!Get_Job_Commission_Record.DepositFirst_Payment_Incentive_Due_Date__c}

﻿Deposit/First Payment Received Date:

{!Get_Job_Commission_Record.Job_Date_of_DepositFirst_Payment__c}

Days to Deposit/First Payment Received Date:

{!forN_NumberDaysTo1stDepositPayment}

Days over threshold:

{!forN_NumberDaysOverDeposit1stPaymentDueDate}

fields.name: QCNoWorkCompleteDate
fields.fieldText:
QUICK COLLECTION﻿


This job must be populated with a Work Complete Date for the Quick Collection Incentive to begin tracking.

fields.name: QCInProgess
fields.fieldText:
QUICK COLLECTION

{!Get_Job_Commission_Record.Quick_Collection_Incentive_Days_Remain__c}

Days Remaining


Work Complete Date:

{!Get_Job_Commission_Record.Job_Work_Complete_Date__c}

Quick Collection Incentive Days:

{!Get_Job_Commission_Record.Collection_Incentive_Threshold__c}

Quick Collection Due Date:

{!Get_Job_Commission_Record.Quick_Collection_Incentive_Due_Date__c}

ROM Contracted Sales:

{!forC_ROMContractedSales}

Paid to Date:

{!forC_PaidToDate}

AR Balance:

{!forC_ARBalance}

fields.name: QCWinner
fields.fieldText:
QUICK COLLECTION

﻿

Outstanding, {!Get_Employee_Commission_Records_For_Current_User.Employee__r.FirstName}! You earned the Quick Collection Incentive which adds

{!forC_ActualQuickCollectAmount}

﻿to your commissions for this Job.


Quick Collection Due Date:

{!Get_Job_Commission_Record.Quick_Collection_Incentive_Due_Date__c}

Job Fully Collected Date:

{!Get_Job_Commission_Record.Job_Date_Fully_Collected__c}

Tier Basis Points

{!Get_Job_Commission_Record.Actual_Quick_Collection_Incentive__c}%

﻿ROM Contracted Sales:

{!forC_ROMContractedSales}

fields.name: QCSLow
fields.fieldText:
QUICK COLLECTION


The Quick Collection Incentive was not earned. It was valued at {!Get_Job_Commission_Record.Quick_Collection_Incentive__c}% / {!forC_CurrentValueQuickCollection}


ROM Contracted Sales:

{!forC_ROMContractedSales}

Quick Collection Due Date:

{!Get_Job_Commission_Record.Quick_Collection_Incentive_Due_Date__c}

fields.name: qcFullyColl
fields.fieldText:
This job qualifies for the Slow Collection Incentive which gives you

{!Get_Job_Commission_Record.Actual_Slow_Collection_Incentive__c}% / {!forC_ActualSlowCollectAmount}

added to your Collection-Based Calculation for this Job.


Tier Basis Points

{!Get_Job_Commission_Record.Actual_Slow_Collection_Incentive__c}%

Job Fully Collected Date:

{!Get_Job_Commission_Record.Job_Date_Fully_Collected__c}

fields.name: qcarbal
fields.fieldText:
Once fully collected, this job will qualify for the Slow Collection Incentive.


AR Balance:

{!forC_ARBalance}

fields.name: del7
fields.fieldText:
POTENTIAL EARNINGS


The Incentive Amount is calculated by multiplying four metrics:

Job Amount: {!forC_ROMContractedSales}

Split Multiplier: {!forN_SplitMultiplier}

Individual Split Percentage: {!Get_Employee_Commission_Records_For_Current_User.Individual_Split_Percentage__c}%

Incentive Percentage:

* Deposit/1st Payment - {!Get_Job_Commission_Record.Deposit_First_Payment_Incentive__c}%

* Quick Collection - {!Get_Job_Commission_Record.Quick_Collection_Incentive__c}%

* Slow Collection - {!Get_Job_Commission_Record.Slow_Collection_Incentive__c}%


Current Value of Incentives:

fields.name: potentialDep1st
fields.fieldText:
Deposit/First Payment Incentive

{!forC_ROMContractedSales} x {!forN_SplitMultiplier} x {!Get_Employee_Commission_Records_For_Current_User.Individual_Split_Percentage__c}% x {!Get_Job_Commission_Record.Deposit_First_Payment_Incentive__c}% =

{!forC_CurrentValueDep1stPay}

fields.name: potentquick
fields.fieldText:
Quick Collection Incentive

{!forC_ROMContractedSales} x {!forN_SplitMultiplier} x {!Get_Employee_Commission_Records_For_Current_User.Individual_Split_Percentage__c}% x {!Get_Job_Commission_Record.Quick_Collection_Incentive__c}% =

{!forC_CurrentValueQuickCollection}

fields.name: potentialslow
fields.fieldText:
Slow Collection Incentive

{!forC_ROMContractedSales} x {!forN_SplitMultiplier} x {!Get_Employee_Commission_Records_For_Current_User.Individual_Split_Percentage__c}% x {!Get_Job_Commission_Record.Slow_Collection_Incentive__c}% =

{!forC_CurrentValueSlowCollection}

fields.name: potentialtier1
fields.fieldText:
Shows the maximum amount you can earn if this is a Tier 1 job and all incentives are met.

{!forC_PotentialTotalCommissionsAmount}

Potential Deposit/First Payment Amount:

{!forC_PotentialDepositFirstPaymentAmount}

Potential Quick Collection Amount:

{!forC_PotentialQuickCollectionAmount}﻿

fields.name: appiopweifd
fields.fieldText:
FINALIZED EARNINGS


The final actual amount you earned

{!forC_ActualCommissionAmount}

﻿Deposit/First Payment:

{!forC_ActualDeposit1stPayAmount}

{!forT_CollectionType} Collection:

{!forC_CollectionPayment}

Commission Payment Date:

{!Get_Employee_Commission_Records_For_Current_User.Commission_Payment_Date__c}

value.stringValue: NOTE: No Job Commission details are available at this time.

textTemplates.name: texT_HouseBanner
textTemplates.text: NOTE: This Job is for a House Account and therefore is not commissionable.

textTemplates.name: texT_Job_Tier0_Banner
textTemplates.text: STAY TUNED! Your Job's Margin and Tier have not yet been calculated.

textTemplates.name: texT_Job_Tier1_Banner
textTemplates.text: Your Job's {!forT_ExpectedMargin}Margin is at {!Get_Job_Commission_Record.Job_Margin__c}% and Tier 1 for Commissions.

textTemplates.name: texT_Job_Tier2_Banner
textTemplates.text: Your Job's {!forT_ExpectedMargin}Margin is at {!Get_Job_Commission_Record.Job_Margin__c}% and Tier 2 for Commissions.

textTemplates.name: texT_Job_Tier3_Banner
textTemplates.text: Your Job's {!forT_ExpectedMargin}Margin is at {!Get_Job_Commission_Record.Job_Margin__c}% and Tier 3 for Commissions.

textTemplates.name: texT_Job_Tier4_Banner
textTemplates.text: Your Job's {!forT_ExpectedMargin}Margin is at {!Get_Job_Commission_Record.Job_Margin__c}% and Tier 4 for Commissions.

textTemplates.name: texT_LCBDmessage
textTemplates.text: ALERT: This job is listed {!forT_LCBDissue} and therefore is not commissionable.
